name: The Tale-Telling Heart
desc: A group of people, each with their own story to tell, lights a bonfire at Blue Amber Lake...

customize.text: Properties

<color=#ffffff>Unlock Requirements</color>
Head to the group of people surrounding a campfire in <color=#ece5d8>Blue Amber Lake</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Quest Chain</color>
World Quest Series:

customize.name: East of the Moon, West of the Sun
customize.desc: Meet various people around Nod-Krai, in search of Proofs of the Cognoscenti.

customize.name: The Shoemaker's Children Go Barefoot
customize.desc: The massive facility on Paha Isle seems to hide many secrets...

customize.name: The Tale-Telling Heart
customize.desc: A group of people, each with their own story to tell, lights a bonfire at Blue Amber Lake...

customize.name: Whisper Beneath the Waves
customize.desc: You discover a strange tree at the Eye of Kratti...

customize.text: <color=#ffffff>Rewards</color>

customize.name: Adventure EXP
customize.desc: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
customize.desc:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Achievements</color>
When the Aurora Shines
Starting Location

<color=#ece5d8>Blue Amber Lake, Nod-Krai</color>
<color=#ffffff>Interactive Map:</color>
Quest Objectives

Check near the campfire
Collect Stellafruit, deliver them to Sergeant Octopus, and pass the trial
Return to Colonel Iron Whale
Wake Colonel Iron Whale up
Head to the designated location
Talk to Tolfin
Find the missing lift parts
Activate the lift
Enter the workshop below
Follow Huginn and look for clues
Talk to Tolfin
Follow Huginn and look for clues
Stop the out-of-control machine
Find spare parts
Follow Huginn and find a way to return to the surface
Return to Colonel Iron Whale
Talk to Zhorik
Wake Colonel Iron Whale up
Ride the "Aurora" and search for "treasure"

Talk to Zhorik

Quest Items

customize.name: Stratagema-Cognoscenti's Mask
customize.desc: A cold mask that once concealed a true face. It is said to be a keepsake from Reed Miller, the founder of the Treasure Hoarders. No adornments grace the mask but for the frosty moonlight that dances across its pure silver facade.

customize.name: Spare Part
customize.desc: A spare part that looks like a clockwork key. Seems like it can be used to awaken Colonel Iron Whale.

customize.name: Lever
customize.desc: A lever for operating a lift. For reasons unknown, it was stolen by a Weasel Thief.

customize.name: Photo with Colonel Iron Whale
customize.desc:
A photo pieced back together from recovered fragments.
Scrawled messily on the back are the words: "I'm a bad kid, but thank you. This time, it's not a lie."

customize.name: Stellafruit
customize.desc: A strange, star-shaped fruit that can often be found among the Rippleweeds beside Blue Amber Lake. It seems to contain a mysterious power...

customize.text: Unlock Requirements

<color=#ffffff73>Head to the group of people surrounding a campfire in</color> <color=#ece5d8>Blue Amber Lake</color> <color=#ffffff73>.</color>
<color=#ffffff>Location -</color> <color=#ece5d8>Blue Amber Lake, Nod-Krai</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Teleport to one of the nearby waypoints and go to the quest location.</color>

<color=#ffffff73>The quest starts automatically by going to the group of people around the campfire.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Check near the campfire</color>
<color=#ffffff73>To start the quest, go to the people around the campfire.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Collect Stellafruit, deliver them to Sergeant Octopus, and pass the trial</color>

<color=#ffffff73>Now,</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>must find the Stellafruits scattered nearby.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Most of them can be found inside the Rippleweeds surrounding the lake, which may require</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>to utilize the kuuvahki mechanic to open them.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Remember that</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>needs to stand in a spot brimming with kuuvahki in order to have access to its mechanics.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>When in kuuhenki form,</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>may carry objects with kuuvahki farther than</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>normally would. Use this to solve some of the puzzles.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>With 12 Stellafruits,</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>must take them to the two Sergeant Octopi in the encroaches of the lake</color>

<color=#ffffff73>After delivering 12 Stellafruit to one of them,</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>will have to pass a challenge that involves popping 99 Stellafruit.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>In one challenge,</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>must use kuuvahki rocks to destroy all Stellafruit.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>In the other,</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>must touch the Stellafruit to destroy them. The available Unipolar Fields allow</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>to jump higher than usual. The polarity can be inverted by executing Plunging Attacks.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Return to Colonel Iron Whale</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Wake Colonel Iron Whale up</color>

<color=#ffffff73>Go to the indicated area atop the ship.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Some nearby kuuvahki energy zones allow</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>to jump higher than normal.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Head to the designated location</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Talk to Tolfin</color>

<color=#ffffff73>Go to the indicated area, a lift will take the player up to the quest location.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>The lever is missing, and a weasel stole it!</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Tolfin sends his own weasel friend, Huginn, to chase the thief.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Find the missing lift parts</color>

<color=#ffffff73>Follow the weasel thief to the nearby area</color>
<color=#ffffff73>A group of Treasure Hoarders is present, and more will appear when</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>gets closer to the location</color>
<color=#ffffff73>The following enemies will appear during this quest to reinforce the usual Treasure Hoarders camp</color>

customize.name: Treasure Hoarders: Handyman
customize.desc:
A member of the decentralized criminal organization that has footprints all over the continent and even deep within unknown domains.
These members do physical work and are lower on the pecking order. They are often laughed at for their physique — but when the gang comes under attack, they get a chance to show their unexpectedly high strength and agility.

customize.name: Treasure Hoarders - Marksman
customize.desc:
A member of the decentralized criminal organization that has footprints all over the continent and even deep within unknown domains.
Though they are called "marksmen," this name has an undercurrent of mockery to it, as they use crossbows instead of bows, which require a long period of training to use. It must be said that even hilichurls know how to operate a crossbow. Just point the wider end at the enemy, pull the trigger, and bam — that's all there is to it.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff73>Defeat them all and Huginn will appear with the recovered lever.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Go to it to acquire the parts.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Activate the lift</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Enter the workshop below</color>

<color=#ffffff73>Put the lever in its place and ride the lift.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Follow Huginn and look for clues</color>

<color=#ffffff73>Follow Huginn forward.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>At first,</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>will come across a group of enemies</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>must defeat.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>The following enemies will appear:</color>

customize.name: Blazing Axe Mitachurl
customize.desc:
Muscular hilichurls who wield large two-handed axes.
Attacks with large strikes, and will use Pyro Slimes to infuse their axes with Pyro. They are very lethal.
Usually, repeatedly quenching a weapon the way a Blazing Axe Mitachurl does will decrease the hardness of the metal and cause the axe-head's edge to chip more easily. But such is the strength of the mitachurls that even should the edge disappear altogether, they can still use their axes as hammers.

customize.name: Hilichurl
customize.desc:
The primitive wandering inhabitants of Teyvat's wildernesses.
They look very similar to humanity but seem to have lost both their intellect and spirituality. Their presence on the continent has been recorded for over a thousand years, and yet they have neither history nor civilization.
Since the pitch-black calamity from five hundred years ago, they have begun to spread in large numbers across the land. They are not very strong, and they lack organization, but they nonetheless bring sizable trouble to humans every once in a while.

customize.name: Large Hydro Slime
customize.desc:
A monster created by the sedimentation of Hydro dispersed throughout nature.
A larger and more powerful Hydro Slime that can create bubbles to entrap its enemies. It is said that they can grow to truly staggering sizes if given an energy-rich environment. Eyewitnesses have supposedly seen Hydro Slimes as large as a small mound in Wolvendom.

customize.name: Hydro Slime
customize.desc:
A small monster created by the sedimentation of Hydro dispersed throughout nature.
Legend has it that some people would use Hydro Slimes as an emergency water source, packing them in preparation for travels through dry regions or deep domains. But due to the high concentration of Hydro within these slimes, direct ingestion is, in fact, harmful to the human body.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff73>After defeating them, Huginn will uncover an Exquisite Chest, which</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>must interact with to progress the Quest.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Talk to Tolfin</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Follow Huginn and look for clues</color>

<color=#ffffff73>After chatting with Tolfin, follow Huginn again.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>To catch the mole, order Huginn to stand in one of the holes, then stand in the other one to catch it.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>After reaching the room with the waypoint,</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>will find another Sergent Octopus.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Stop the out-of-control machine</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Find spare parts</color>

<color=#ffffff73>Jump over the Sergeant Octopus electric attacks.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>When</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>reaches it, interact to stop it and advance the quest.</color>
The player <color=#ffffff73>will search and find the spare parts.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Follow Huginn and find a way to return to the surface</color>

<color=#ffffff73>The cavern has collapsed, locking</color> the player's group in.
<color=#ffffff73>Follow Huginn, who will lead</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>to a journal.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>After the short interaction, interact again to uncover a kuuvahki robot.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>With its kuuvahki field,</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>will be able to destroy a nearby wall and escape the underground, now just ride the lift back up.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Return to Colonel Iron Whale</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Talk to Zhorik</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Wake Colonel Iron Whale up</color>

<color=#ffffff73>Return to the machine.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>After a brief chat sequence, install the spare parts.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Ride the "Aurora" and search for "treasure"</color>

<color=#ffffff73>After activating the Colonel Iron Whale, moonlanes will appear.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Ride the moonlanes to progress, entering a challenge mode.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Collect all the energy orbs</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>comes across.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Make sure to swap lanes in order to not miss any of them.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Talk to Paimon</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Talk to Zhorik</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff73>Talk to Tolfin</color>

<color=#ffffff73>After completing the challenge,</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>will enter a dialogue sequence.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>By the end of it,</color> the player <color=#ffffff73>will obtain</color>

customize.name: Stratagema-Cognoscenti's Mask
customize.desc: A cold mask that once concealed a true face. It is said to be a keepsake from Reed Miller, the founder of the Treasure Hoarders. No adornments grace the mask but for the frosty moonlight that dances across its pure silver facade.

customize.text:
.
<color=#ffffff73>The player will receive "When the Aurora Shines" achievement after completing this quest.</color>
<color=#ffd780>Achievement Category - Wonders of the World</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the Aurora Shines</color>
Make radiant ribbons appear in the sky over Blue Amber Lake.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.
